ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Provides extra functions to manipulate dendrograms that build on the base functions provided by the 'stats' package. The main functionality it is designed to add is the ability to colour all the edges in an object of class 'dendrogram' according to cluster membership i.e. each subtree is coloured, not just the terminal leaves. In addition it provides some utility functions to cut 'dendrogram' and 'hclust' objects and to  set/get labels.

Provides extra functions to manipulate dendrograms that build on the base functions provided by the 'stats' package. The main functionality it is designed to add is the ability to colour all the edges in an object of class 'dendrogram' according to cluster membership i.e. each subtree is coloured, not just the terminal leaves. In addition it provides some utility functions to cut 'dendrogram' and 'hclust' objects and to  set/get labels.

name: r-dendroextras
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.2.3' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-dendroextras
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/dendroextras_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/dendroextras/dendroextras_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 1d8708286a3e8c6008eb464a5eb57fffd842662c3f1630d7e66c59fd56666741

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 1006
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('dendroextras')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('dendroextras')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=dendroextras
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Provides extra functions to manipulate dendrograms that build on the base functions
    provided by the 'stats' package. The main functionality it is designed to add is
    the ability to colour all the edges in an object of class 'dendrogram' according
    to cluster membership i.e. each subtree is coloured, not just the terminal leaves.
    In addition it provides some utility functions to cut 'dendrogram' and 'hclust'
    objects and to  set/get labels.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
